a.) 0,375000(10) = 0,011(2)

c.) 3,625000 (10) = 11,101(2)

05a.) manualmente
a.) 101,11(2) + 10,011(2) = 1000,001(2)
b.) 1000,101(2) - 10,01(2) = 110,011(2)
c.) 101,101(2) * 10,101(2) = 1110,10111(2) 
d.) 10111,01(2) / 11,011(2) = 110(2)
e.) 1101011(2) % 1101(2) = 1101(2)
